categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic Systems Armies

nodes.text: Systems Army Alpha consisted of 294,912 clone troopers and was commanded by High Jedi General (and Jedi Council member) Mace Windu. One of its two Sectors Armies was the 2nd Sector Army, commanded by Ry-Gaul, which contained Aayla Secura's 327th Star Corps.
